column4: Help!  I can't get Wi-fi on my Ubuntu 11.10 laptop!  It was working fine earlier today, I've done nothing to it!
It's a Broadcom.  It's worked just fkne before, though.  I didn't even screw with the drivers or  config
No.  Gonna see if it works on Windows
are you sure there is not a switch or button/combo of buttons you can press to turn on and off the wireless card
